sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { IMenuCafe } from '../models/menuCafeInterface'; import { MenuCafeService } from '../services/menuCafe.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { Dish:any = undefined; Dishes: Observable= [] ifReady: boolean = false; constructor(private menuCafeService: MenuCafeService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.menuCafeService.getAll().subscribe(Dishes => { this.Dishes = Dishes console.log(Dishes) }) console.log(this.Dishes) this.ifReady = true; } ShowDish(dish: IMenuCafe): void { this.Dish = dish; } }
